description: Need dinner inspo for the family? Try this easy pizza recipe that's topped with tender pulled pork and spicy jalapeños. Meat-lovers are sure to rejoice.
name: Pulled Pork & Jalapeño Pizza Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 560g Woolworths slow cooked pork shoulder with BBQ sauce

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 240°C/220°C fan-forced. Line 2 baking trays with baking paper.

Place bag containing pork, flat-side up, in a microwave-safe dish. Pierce flat side of bag twice. Microwave on high for 8 minutes or until pork is heated through. Stand for 2 minutes. Carefully cut bag open, then remove pork from bag and transfer to a board. Using 2 forks, roughly shred pork. Discard cooking liquid.

Spread pizza bases with barbecue sauce sachet. Sprinkle with 1/2 cup mozzarella, then top with spinach, pork, onion, jalapeño and remaining cheese. Bake for 15 minutes or until cheese is golden and bases are crisp. Serve sprinkled with coriander.
